copy: Responsive, personable and passionate about his craft, which is evidenced by the amount of energy, hours and pride he pours into each project.
Consistently provided excellent service with a superior expertise in his field. He has become a reliable source of knowledge and a trusted consultant.
Combines some unique skills - the ability to tackle an application development effort from start to finish, coordinate a team of resources, and present eloquently to a clien
Works quickly, intelligently, without the need for supervision, and with an A-class attitude. He gets the "big picture" of client goals, and is flawless in his delivery
Passionate, smart, person with great forward-thinking ideas. listens, sees the 'big picture' and great problem solver!
His creativity and innovative ideas contributed to the success of several of my marketing campaigns and promotion.
Commitment to work as well as his attention to detail and creative eye during development made his work admirable.
